Unnamed: 1: TH max  associated with Hmax should be calculated from the wave steepness (S) according to TH
The current is in-line with the wave, uniform to 70 m, and then uniform from 70 m to the bottom with speed reduced by 1 m/s
The storm tide includes both storm surge and tide, i.e. reference is to MLLW.
Where waves are depth-limited, calculate Hmax according to Hmax = 0.78(depth + storm tide).
Basis: (1) = based on comprehensive hindcast study verified against measurements, (2) = based on hindcasts and/or
